This video describes how to create and submit an ethics application, using the PPLS Ethics system

:::lo
**LEARNING OBJECTIVES**

1. Understand how to create a PPLS Ethics application.
1. Understand how to use the PPLS Ethics system to craft a DPIA.
:::


# Video


This screencast describes how to create an Ethics application using the PPLS System

The Ethics Application system can be found [here](https://resource.ppls.ed.ac.uk/ethics/index.php). An EASE login is required.

For questions and comments, contact [hugh.rabagliati@ed.ac.uk](hugh.rabagliati@ed.ac.uk). Note, this is a screencast, so there are no slides to follow along with.
